name: Control Environment
description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values through policies, procedures, and organizational structure.
objective: Establish and maintain a control environment that supports the achievement of the entity's objectives related to reliable financial reporting, effective and efficient operations, and compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
control_activities: Board of Directors provides oversight of the entity's system of internal control
Management establishes the tone at the top through communications and actions
Code of conduct is established and communicated to all personnel
Human resource policies and procedures support the achievement of objectives
Performance measures, incentives, and rewards are aligned with objectives
key_attributes: Demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values
Exercises oversight responsibility for the system of internal control
Enforces accountability for the system of internal control

compliance_mappings.requirement: Demonstrates Commitment to Integrity and Ethical Values

testing_procedures: Review board charter and meeting minutes for evidence of oversight
Examine code of conduct and evidence of communication to personnel
Test employee acknowledgment of code of conduct
Review HR policies for alignment with control objectives
Evaluate performance measurement and incentive systems
